title: Summon Hydra
data: {{version030}} {{spell info}} [[Summon Hydra]] is a level 7 [[Summonings|Summoning]] spell which summons a friendly [[hydra]]. ==Useful Info== A hydra with 4 to 12 heads is summoned. The number of heads depends on [[spell power]]; the hydra will have (1d - 1) / 6 heads, but there is an 83% chance that its heads are capped at 8.{{source ref|0.30.0|spl-summoning.cc|268}} The duration of the summon does not depend on the spell power and is always very short, around 9 turns. There is a summon limit of 2; additional summons will cause the oldest to very quickly time out. ==Strategy== Summon Hydra effectively takes the role of a [[Conjurations]] spell to a summoner. Hydras offer a high damage per turn, but since they time out very quickly, this spell has a relatively poor MP efficiency. Useful if you want to kill something quickly. ==Monster Version== {{monsters with spell}} Note that [[Bai Suzhen]] cannot cast this spell while in the storm dragon form. ==History== *Summon Hydra was added in [[0.8]]. ==References==
